name: CreateServiceCustomField
description:
Create a new custom field for services.

This tool is used to create a new custom field for services in PagerDuty, including field options if provided. It is useful when you need to add custom metadata or specifications to a service. Requires custom_fields.write permission.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The versioning header for API requests, specified in the `Accept` header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: Specifies the media type of the resource. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: custom_field_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the custom field to be created, including data type, description, display name, field type, and options.

data_type.description: The kind of data the custom field is allowed to contain.

description.description: A description of the data this field contains.

display_name.description: The human-readable name of the field. This must be unique across an account.

data_type.description: The kind of data represented by this option. Must match the Field's `data_type`.

value.description: The value of the field option. Must be unique within the field.

data.description: The data content of the field option.

field_type.description: The type of data this field contains. In combination with the `data_type` field.

name.description: The name of the field. May include ASCII characters, specifically lowercase letters, digits, and underescores. The `name` for a Field must be unique and cannot be changed once created.

field.description: Details of the custom field to be created.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

data_type.description: The kind of data the custom field is allowed to contain.

description.description: A description of the data this field contains.

display_name.description: The human-readable name of the field. This must be unique across an account.

data_type.description: The kind of data represented by this option. Must match the Field's `data_type`.

value.description: The value of the field option. Must be unique within the field.

data.description: The data content of the field option.

field_type.description: The type of data this field contains. In combination with the `data_type` field.

name.description: The name of the field. May include ASCII characters, specifically lowercase letters, digits, and underescores. The `name` for a Field must be unique and cannot be changed once created.

field.description: Details of the custom field to be created.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
